page.title: 17Leigh's Day at School
page.content:
School starts at 9.00 when I go down to the hall for assembly. This finishes at 9.30 and I do my maths until 10.35. I then go out to play football if the grass is not wet, but if it is my friends and I just run about. My favourite subjects are creative writing, language and maths. After playtime we do Welsh with a visiting teacher. At lunch time I have my sandwiches and the lunch break ends at 1.30. Then we might have gym and play rounders. Some other time it could be Geography, History or Science. I also like to use the computer when it's in our class. Afternoon break is at 2.35 and after break we have music and then leave school at 3.30 to go home again.
Written by Leigh Jenkins aged10.
